Adding the Thomas DP memo as well (this is why we need help with the organization!). 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Wednesday, April 14, 2021 5:06 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: (USANYS)<> 
Subject: Noel & Thomas DP memos 
Ha,
We are sending you the DP memos for Noel and Thomas. 
(USANYS) 
We are also sending you the various application materials so that you have them all in one place. 
Let us know if you have any comments/edits/etc. on the memos that you would like us to address. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00031449
